We are proud to announce the launch of our new Litestar website! We've created a modern, comprehensive platform that serves as the central hub for everything regarding Litestar and it's ecosystem.
Our redesigned website brings together all the resources you need to build amazing applications with Litestar, featuring a clean design, improved navigation, and new features.
One of our most exciting new features is the

- a comprehensive catalog of official and community plugins that extend Litestar's capabilities. Browse by category, search for specific functionality, and discover tools that can accelerate your development workflow.
Have you created a plugin for Litestar? We'd love to feature it in our directory! To submit your plugin:
Add your plugin information following our submission guidelines
Create a pull request with your plugin details
Our team will review your submission and help showcase your contribution to the Litestar ecosystem.
Stay up-to-date with the latest Litestar news, tutorials, and community highlights in our new blog section. We'll be sharing:
We're working on a comprehensive deployment section that will cover:
This section will help you take your Litestar applications from development to production with confidence.
We're developing interactive tutorials to help you learn Litestar hands-on. These will cover everything from basic concepts to advanced patterns.

Stay tuned for more updates as we approach the v3 release!
The Litestar project thrives because of our amazing community. Here's how you can get involved:
Litestar is open source and welcomes contributors! Whether you're interested in:
: Bug fixes, new features, performance improvements
: Writing guides, improving examples, fixing typos
: Helping others on Discord and GitHub
: Creating tools that extend Litestar's capabilities
